Load metadata

```{r}
metadata = read.table("./data/stubbington_2016/E-MTAB-3857.sdrf.txt", sep = "\t", header = T)
```



Load TraCeR results

```{r}
tracer_simple = readTracer(summaryPath = "./data/stubbington_2016/filtered_TCRABDG_summary/")
tracer_simple_AB = readTracer(summaryPath = "./data/stubbington_2016/filtered_TCRABDG_summary/", 
                clonotypes = list(list(c(T, T, F, F), c(T, T, F, F))),
                nameVar = "clAB")
```
